remarks: The product of a family of commutative monoids is commutative. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdscmnd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdscmnd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdscmnd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdscmnd.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> CMnd ) $.
prdscmnd $p |- ( ph -> Y e. CMnd ) $.
